page.title: 09Wroxall's new school.
page.content: We are going to have{a new school}in Wroxall because the old one is too small,cold and damp and the staples in books go rusty.It is 112 years old. The parents and governers wrote to the Prime Minister and organised a petition with 720 signatures.Our mums went to County Hall with banners to hand it in. On the 24 of May at 11:00 we went to St.Martins Road to the field where the new school will be.We put some flags up and the people came to the field.We sat on a bank and some of us removed the first turfs.Then we cheered and we all had a drink and a biscuit. Today we went to look at the work. There are three JCBs and 7 men and lots of bricks and 1 lorry and lots of dirt.
